page.title: 13Farms to private houses
page.content: { LINDRICK FARM}In 1968 the farmer sold his land except for three fields close by the farm.He left Tickhill and now his sister lives there.The house has been a private residence since 1968. {MILL FARM} In 1979 the farmer retired after farming at Mill Farm for sixty one years.The land, which was owned by Lord Scarbrough, was sold by auction in 1979, two paddocks being retained by Lord Scarbrough.The house was sold for a private residence in 1981. {FRIARY FARM} The farmer retired in 1977.The farmhouse and most of the land (owned by Lord Scarbrough) were sold by auction.The house interior has been redesigned and a new wing has been added.Also a barn has been converted into a dwelling place.Eleven acres of land ,adjacent to the farm ,were bought along with the house.
